# avd-for-devs Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-15

## Active Technologies
- Bicep (Azure IaC), PowerShell 7.x + Azure Resource Manager, Azure Virtual Desktop service, Windows 11 Multi-session marketplace image (001-avd-dev-vscode)
- N/A (VM managed disks only) (001-avd-dev-vscode)

- Azure Bicep (latest), PowerShell (Az module) + Azure Verified Modules (AVM) for Desktop Virtualization resources, Compute (VM), Network (VNet/Subnet); Azure Image Builder; winget (inside customization) (001-avd-dev-vscode)

## Code Style
